title: Fully Furnished and All Utilities Included 2bd 2bath home for rent
posting_body: Lovely fully furnished and all utilities included 2bedroom 2 full bath home in desirable Detroit neighborhood close to downtown and highway access.
Everything you need to feel right at home.
Chefs kitchen and choice of 3 outside grills.
Master bedroom has king size temper pedic mattress and in suite full bathroom/closet.
Quest room has a full size bed with closet and lots of storage.
Front and back patio to relax and enjoy the views.
Pikes Peak view from the back.
Off street parking for one vehicle.
Half months deposit due for security.
Available for varying lengths of stay or leases.
